metadata.title: CVE-2020-20892 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in function filter_frame inlibavfilter/vf_lenscorrection.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to causea Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts due to a division by zero.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
qtwebengine-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
